name: Parcelo
stack: React, Shadcn, Tailwind CSS, MongoDB, Express, mongoose
description: A comprehensive, full-stack parcel delivery and tracking platform designed for modern logistics operations across Bangladesh. Built with React, TypeScript, and a robust backend architecture to handle everything from parcel booking to real-time delivery tracking.
details: About Parcelo streamlines the entire parcel delivery lifecycle with separate interfaces for senders, receivers, delivery personnel, and administrators. The platform provides real-time tracking, automated pricing calculation, secure payment processing, and comprehensive delivery management tools
challenges: Faced issues in implementing real-time updates for product availability and integrating secure payment methods. Handling different user roles dynamically was also a challenge.
futurePlans: Planning to integrate AI-driven Parcel recommendations, enhance security for payments.

name: AI-Scholar
stack: Next.js,NextAuth, Shadcn, Tailwind CSS, MongoDB, Express, mongoose
description: AI Scholar is a full-stack, AI-powered Course Management System (CMS) engineered to elevate online education with personalized learning paths, smart content generation, dynamic analytics, and intuitive UI/UX. This client-side application serves as the user-facing interface for students, instructors, and admins to access, interact, and manage educational resources in an intelligent and engaging environment.
details: AI Scholar is a full-stack, AI-powered Course Management System (CMS) engineered to elevate online education with personalized learning paths, smart content generation, dynamic analytics, and intuitive UI/UX. This client-side application serves as the user-facing interface for students, instructors, and admins to access, interact, and manage educational resources in an intelligent and engaging environment.
challenges: Faced issues in implementing real-time updates for product availability and integrating secure payment methods. Handling different user roles dynamically was also a challenge.

name: Athlete Zone - Fitness Tracking App
description: A fitness tracking app that helps users track their workouts and progress in a structured way.
details: Developed a fitness tracker with features for logging workouts and tracking goals. Challenges included implementing efficient data handling with MongoDB.
challenges: Faced difficulties in efficiently storing and retrieving workout data for individual users. Also had to optimize database queries for better performance.
futurePlans: Future updates will include data visualization for progress tracking, push notifications for workout reminders, and a social feature for users to share their achievements.

name: Gadget Heaven - E-Commerce Website
description: A sleek and responsive e-commerce website for browsing and purchasing gadgets.
details: Designed and implemented an intuitive interface for gadget browsing and purchasing.
challenges: Faced challenges in managing responsive layouts across different devices and integrating Firebase authentication smoothly.
futurePlans: Plans include adding customer reviews, implementing a product comparison feature, and integrating AI-powered product recommendations.

name: Online Tutor Booking Platform
description: A platform for booking tutors online with personalized options for students.
details: Built a platform to connect students with tutors efficiently.
challenges: Faced challenges in implementing real-time scheduling, ensuring availability synchronization between tutors and students, and handling multiple bookings effectively.
futurePlans: Future improvements include integrating video conferencing for seamless online sessions and implementing a rating system for tutors to enhance trust and credibility.
